name: Ace Stickman Tennis - 2016 World Championship Edition
name_original: Ace Stickman Tennis - 2016 World Championship Edition
description:
Play a match with the all-star famous stickman! Challenge yourself or your friends to a fast hitting smash of a game! Just flick or swipe your finger to play, simple yet challenging!

* Smashing simple game play!
* Power shots, returns, volleys, spins and more!
* Play for fame or fortune!

How to play:
Touch and hold to charge power.
Drag to aim.
Release to swing!

DOWNLOAD IT FREE TODAY!
